articles.title: Team USA rebounds from back-to-back losses with blowout of Argentina - ESPN Australia
articles.description: After back-to-back losses, Team USA got 17 points apiece from Kevin Durant and Bradley Beal and routed Argentina 108-80 in Tuesday's pre-Olympic exhibition game.
articles.content:
LAS VEGAS -- Team USA stabilized itself by putting together the most complete game of its Olympic preparation schedule, beating Argentina 108-80 on Tuesday night.
After back-to-back losses that saw … [+3404 chars]
